mapper.select: SELECT U.ID USER_ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, NICKNAME, GENDER, AGE, ENABLED, LAST_PASSWORD_RESET_DATE, P.ID PASSENGER_ID, D.ID DRIVER_ID,DRIVER_STATUS, A.ID AUTHORITY_ID, NAME FROM USER U LEFT OUTER JOIN PASSENGER P ON U.ID=P.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN DRIVER D ON U.ID=D.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_AUTHORITY UA ON U.ID=UA.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN AUTHORITY A ON UA.AUTHORITY_ID=A.ID WHERE U.ID=#{id}
